item.description:
Panzer Miniatures contain all gameplay aids and rules necessary to use the additional unit cards and organizations contained in Panzer® PaK 1—East Front Organizations.

This book is packed full of 72 pages of detail in full color. Inside you will find all the German TO&E charts covering the German forces from 1940 until 1945. You will get to field everything from elite Pioneer Battalions to Volks Grenadier Regiments. Enjoy the detail of the Reconnaissance Battalions to the simple Fusilier Company, its all in here.

Just so you won’t think that the Soviet forces have not been given their due Panzer® PaK 1 includes Heavy and Light SU Regiments, Sapper Companies and Guards Rifle Regiments. You won’t lack for variety with this expansion.

In addition you get an additional 16 German unit cards and 16 Soviet unit cards, including the Wirbelwind, 8.8cm PaK 43/41 ATG, and the KV-2 M41 to name just a few.

Included components:


 German Army TO&E: General organizations from 1940 until 1945 — includes Panzer Division, (mot) Infantry & Panzer Grenadier Divisions, Infantry and Volks Grenadier Divisions to the individual vehicle, gun and squad level 



 Soviet Army TO&E: General organizations from 1941 until 1945 — includes Tank Division, Mechanized Division, Tank Corps, Mechanized Corps and Infantry Division to the individual vehicle, gun and squad level 



 Unit Data Cards: 32 new unit data cards 


Expands:

 Panzer Miniatures
